body.p: This element should be used in place of the template.XULElem("window") element for dialog boxes. The template.XULAttr("buttons") attribute may be used to set which buttons should appear in the dialog box. These buttons will be placed in the correct locations for the user's platform.
More information is available in the XUL tutorial and Dialogs and prompts (code snippets).
